explanation: Start the Laravel development server to test the project locally.
Install a specific version of PHPUnit for testing in your Laravel project.
Create a new test class for the Product model.
Create a new unit test for the Product model.
Initialize a new Git repository in your project directory.
Stage all files for the initial commit.
Commit the staged changes with a message.
Add the GitHub repository as a remote.
Push the code to the main branch of your GitHub repository.
